title: Embroidered Picture, mid–late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: knot stitches on 5-harness satin
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Picture of a girl on a donkey and a boy on a bull with a flock of sheep in a rural landscape done entirely in knot stitches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, mid–late 18th century.
mid–late 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: knot stitches on 5-harness satin. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-58-26.
